Sentencas: It is shown that in the temperature range of 20-600 degrees C, Cd-doped Ln(2)MoO(6) (Ln = La, Pr) samples expand linearly, and their thermal expansion coefficients (10-12) x 10(-6) K-1 are close in values to the coefficients of standard solid-oxide fuel cell electrolytes, for example, yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Structural Features and Physical Properties of Tetragonal Ln2MoO6 (Ln = La, Pr) Oxymolybdates Doped with Cadmium Atoms

Sentencas: Cadmium heterovalent doping of lanthanum oxymolybdate increases the conductivity of the compound by an order of magnitude but reduces its hygroscopicity, as evidenced by the data of thermogravimetric analysis.
Titulo: Structural Features and Physical Properties of Tetragonal Ln2MoO6 (Ln = La, Pr) Oxymolybdates Doped with Cadmium Atoms
